member.name: T:onYOURway.StartUp.WebApiConfig
member.summary: Class to register the custom WebApi configuration for Breeze

member.name: M:onYOURway.StartUp.WebApiConfig.Register(System.Web.Http.HttpConfiguration)
member.summary: Configures the WebApi, enables CORS and Authentication Filters and registers routes.
member.param: HttpConfiguration to be set (passed by the system)

member.name: T:onYOURway.StartUp.CustomBreezeConfig
member.summary: Custom Breeze Confguration

member.name: M:onYOURway.StartUp.CustomBreezeConfig.CreateJsonSerializerSettings
member.summary: Customize the JsonSerializer used by the Breeze ApiController
member.remarks: Beware of settings that confuse the breeze client

member.name: T:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController
member.summary: Api for mapping data: regions and locations in these regions

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.Metadata
member.summary: Returns object metadata based on the DB schema required by the Breeze client

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.Messages(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all localizable messages for the app in the given language
member.param: language or locale to return the messages in if this parameter is omitted, the first browser language is used

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.Realms
member.summary: A realm (e.g. the the onYOURway-Project, 'Karte von morgen', the Green Map System or the TransforMap project) uses different capabilities of the onYOURway-mapping paltform, may have its own taxonomy and covers locations in different regions. The combination of realm, region and creator define how an entry can be administered.

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.Regions
member.summary: Geographical region (country, city) and administrative domain usually maintained by one realm. E.g. "Bayreuth von morgen"

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.SearchSuggestions(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all features of the selected region as search suggestions (typeahead) for the main search box

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.Places(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Gets all searchable features (Ventures, (Transport)Lines, (Transport)Stops, T)

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.GetTaxonomy(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: DEPRICATED

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.LocateController.Place(System.Guid)
member.summary: DEPRICATED

member.name: M:onYOURway.Controllers.MyController.Notify(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sendet eine Nachricht mit Kontaktdaten

member.name: T:onYOURway.Models.Entry
member.summary: An Entry is an item of interest. Currently this can be a Location or an Event.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Entry.Name
member.summary: Native Name of the Entry.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Entry.Description
member.summary: Native Description of the Entry.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Entry.OpeningHours
member.summary: Opening hours of events and locations

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Entry.SourceKey
member.summary: When importing data from foreign sources this is a unique key for the import source Recuring imports from the same source should use the same key.
member.remarks: The key may correspond to an external system key but it is not intended to create an external system for every imported spreadsheet.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Entry.SourceId
member.summary: When importing data from foreign sources this is the unique id to identify the individual entry/record in the external source.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.Key
member.summary: Unique id

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.Name
member.summary: Native name e.g. used as title in realm description

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.UrlPattern
member.summary: RegEx pattern to recognize Realm from url

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.SuggestItems
member.summary: Comma seperated list of items to return in search suggestions

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.Description
member.summary: Description in the native language of the realm. In case of international activity we suggest using english here.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.LogoUrl
member.summary: Path to the logo for the Realm (should be relative to the path /Content/{RealmKey} and be 160x160 pixel)

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.TaxonomyId
member.summary: Root tag of the taxonomy used by this realm thus selecting the available taxonomy

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.Boundary
member.summary: Optional geographical focus of the realm. Null means worldwide.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.Localizations
member.summary: Navigation property
member.remarks: Joins and foreign keys are generated by this

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Realm.Taxonomy
member.summary: Root category of the taxonomy used by the realm.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.RealmLocalized.RealmKey
member.summary: Key of realm to be localized

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.RealmLocalized.Locale
member.summary: Locale e.g. "de-DE" or language e.g. "de" of localization

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.RealmLocalized.Name
member.summary: Localized name

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.RealmLocalized.Description
member.summary: Localized description

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.BaseMapFeature.Type
member.summary: Feature type e.g.: Country, City, Province, Street

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.BaseMapFeature.Name
member.summary: Native Name

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.BaseMapFeature.BoundingBox
member.summary: Bounding box of the

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Location.Position
member.summary: Point to show a pin on a map

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Location.Boundary
member.summary: Optional boundary (if the location covers a larger area, e.g. a park.)

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.EntryLocalization.Id
member.summary: This allows multiple localized Names / Aliases

member.name: T:onYOURway.Models.EntryLink
member.summary: Links to websites, phone numbers email addresses, ...
member.remarks: Do not replicate with systems enforcing this table to be published e.g. ODbL

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.EntryLink.AccessLevel
member.value: 0 ... do not publish, ues for administrative purpose only
1 ... humans only, try to protect against grabbers, publish in details and via throttled API
2 ... include in bulk results in API, exports and publish to external systems

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Category.ValueType
member.summary: Indicates if the tag assignment can have a value and what data-/type it is. - null ... no value allowed (the category is assigned or not) - string - array of options e.g. ['green', 'blue', 'red']

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.Category.Values
member.summary: Optional: Semicolon seperated list of possible values

member.name: T:onYOURway.Models.Message
member.summary: Localization Messages

member.summary: Add additional Db schema definitions, that can't be done through code annotations, using Fliud Api

member.name: T:onYOURway.Models.ExternalSystem
member.summary: External system, linked to automatically exchan ge data via API or (automated) ETL process.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.ExternalSystem.Website
member.summary: Website of the
member.remarks: This is not nessessarily the base Url of the API.

member.name: P:onYOURway.Models.MapLocalized.Locale
member.summary: Locale e.g. "de-DE" or language e.g. "de" of localization

member.summary: Kind of relationship refering to OWL syntax
